name: Daily POP Crosswords
summary:
FREE Themed Daily Crossword Puzzles–a new fun, pop-culture theme EVERY DAY of the week! Free to download; free to play!

Daily POP Crosswords features the best pop-culture-themed puzzles from the top puzzle constructors, including many Penny Press and Dell Magazines, the #1 crossword-puzzle-magazine publisher. This fun and easy-to-use crossword puzzle app features new, themed puzzles each day. 

FREE POP-CULTURE-THEMED DAILY CROSSWORD PUZZLES
Get brand-new, free themed crossword puzzles every day. Choose your favorite themes and solve them all!

DON’T GET STUCK!
Want a little more help? Hints are available to show letters and reveal words in each puzzle.

WHERE NEXT?
Optional Smart Step navigation advances you effortlessly from one entry to the next, helping you solve even faster.

SEE YOUR MISTAKES
Show Errors in each puzzle at the touch of a button.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES
• Easy to solve using the crossword puzzle grid and pop-up clue list.
• Make it your own! Multiple settings options are available.
• Robust App Tour, User Tips, and Helpful Hints enhance your solving experience.
• New popular-culture-themed puzzles added every day
• Daily POP Crossword puzzles are designed to be solved in a single solving session. 
• All puzzles offer Hints and the option to Show Errors, at any time.
• Solve them all! Choose from a growing puzzle archive.

Email us at customerservice@puzzlenation.com should you have any questions or want to share any feedback. Thanks!
